name: Rosalie Nedler
description: A surgeon with poor bedside manner.

gambit.name: Surgical Intervention
gambit.description: When an adjacent ally or an ally in this units space regains HP, 40% chance to double heal and apply the excess as @{condition:Overheal:[Overheal]} for one turn.
gambit.comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions

comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
